Defer.title: Defer FileVault Enablement
Defer.description: If true, defers enabling FileVault until the designated user logs out. For details, see fdesetup(8). The person enabling FileVault must be either a local user or a mobile account user.

DeferDontAskAtUserLogout.title: Defer - Don't Ask User at logout
DeferDontAskAtUserLogout.description: If true, prevents requests for enabling FileVault at user logout time.

DeferForceAtUserLoginMaxBypassAttempts.title: Defer - Force At Login After Max Bypass Attempts

ShowRecoveryKey.title: Show FileVault Recovery Key
ShowRecoveryKey.description: If false, prevents display of the personal recovery key to the user after FileVault is enabled.

UseKeychain.title: Escrow institutional recovery key in FileVaultMaster.keychain
UseKeychain.description: If true and no certificate information is provided in this payload, the keychain created at /Library/Keychains/FileVaultMaster.keychain is used when the institutional recovery key is added.

UseRecoveryKey.title: Use Personal Recovery Key
UseRecoveryKey.description: If true, creates a personal recovery key and displays it to the user.

UserEntersMissingInfo.title: Use Personal Recovery Key
UserEntersMissingInfo.description: If true, enables a prompt for missing user name or password fields.

Certificate.title: Certificate
Certificate.description: The DER-encoded certificate data if UseRecoveryKey is enabled.

PayloadCertificateUUID.title: PayloadCertificateUUID
PayloadCertificateUUID.description: The UUID of the payload within the same profile containing the asymmetric recovery key certificate payload.
